answers.answer: Congratulations mommy! Hope all goes well.

question: My baby boy- Isaac Anthony Ashton will be here some time tomorrow. I will be 39w2d... been high risk for high blood pressure- dr dnt want me hitting 40w fear of preeclampsia (spelling)... Really nervous bc being induced hurts worse than going on ur own! But im so ready to have my body bck to myself- other than breastfeeding! Lol :)
title: Induction @6am tomorrow...
